Detailed Description

Buffered USART implementation.

Author:
M. P. Hayes, UCECE
Date:
15 May 2007

Define Documentation

#define BUSART0_ENABLE   (USART_NUM >= 1)

A BUSART can be disabled in the target.h file, e.g., using define BUSART0_ENABLE 0.

#define BUSART1_ENABLE   (USART_NUM >= 2)

int8_t busart_getc ( busart_t  busart  ) 

Read character. This blocks until the character can be read.

Read size bytes. This will block until the desired number of bytes have been read.

bool busart_read_ready_p ( busart_t  busart  ) 

Return non-zero if there is a character ready to be read.

ring_size_t busart_write ( busart_t  busart,
const void *  data,
ring_size_t  size 
)

Write size bytes. Currently this only writes as many bytes (up to the desired size) that can currently fit in the ring buffer.

References ring_write(), busart_dev_struct::tx_irq_enable, and busart_dev_struct::tx_ring.

bool busart_write_ready_p ( busart_t  busart  )
